channel.title: People are amazing
channel.description:
My faith in humanity is getting restored little by little. The mass majority of things we hear or see in the mainstream media is basically people just not getting along. We rarely hear about the amazing things people do, but we always hear about murders, suicides, war mongers, and the like. Let's get a little Real Life Hero's thread going.
If I could save 1 life my life would be complete.
[b] Bus Driver saves 24 passengers before losing his own life 4 days later:[/b]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YJyWY2Fzzr8
[b]Random stranger saves a young child that randomly stopped breathing:[/b]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ezSpfxOxgjM
The second video sent a lot of emotion through me when they hugged, am I a human after all?
